channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Incoming Lai Admin. Announces New Tech and Economic Development Officials
item.description: Taiwan's incoming administration under President-elect Lai Ching-te has announced new cabinet ministers related to tech and economic development.

item.title: Aftershocks Briefly Disconnect Major Northern Taiwan Power Plant From Grid
item.description: Aftershocks following the Hualien earthquake have caused Taoyuan’s Datan Power Plant to briefly disconnect from the grid due to damage to its power units. But a bigger power outage

item.title: Taipei City Planners To Tear Down Structurally Unsound ‘Sea-Sand Buildings’
item.description: Taipei officials are planning to demolish and renovate more of the city's “sea-sand buildings.” The move comes after the recent Hualien earthquake damaged structurally unsound buil

item.title: Film Studio Backlot, Former Amusement Park Damaged in South Taiwan Fire
item.description: A film studio backlot and former amusement park in Tainan has been heavily damaged by fire. Fire fighters managed to contain the blaze at Baihe Taiwan Film and TV Town and reporte
